mapper.select: select R.TXN_NO, TO_CHAR(R.REVIEW_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REVIEW_TIMESTAMP, R.REVIEW_STATUS, R.REVIEW_RATING, R.REVIEW_CONT, P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_PRICE, T.MEM_NO, M.MEM_ALIAS AS mem_name, F.FILE_ID, F.FILE_ORG_NAME, F.FILE_SAVE_NAME, F.FILE_SIZE, F.FILE_TYPE, F.FILE_PATH, F.FILE_SOURCE, F.FILE_NO, F.FILE_TOTAL from REVIEW R inner join TRANSACTION T ON(R.TXN_NO = T.TXN_NO) inner join PRODUCT P ON(P.PROD_NO = T.PROD_NO) inner join MEMBER M ON(M.MEM_NO = P.MEM_NO ) inner join IMG_FILE F ON (P.prod_no = F.FILE_NO) where file_source=200
